name: CadessDeVie
tag_list: social-networking, charity, women, beauty, health, deals, group-buy, group-buying, wellness, discounts, coupons, savings, groupon, voucher, livingsocial, bloomspot, spafinder, lifebooker
overview:
CadessDeVie.com is a group buying website offering 50% and more discounts on top-rated beauty, wellness, fitness and recreation services in New York City.

The business is designed to integrate social awareness into the shopping experience by allocating a generous portion of monthly revenue generated from our offers to local charities close to the hearts of women.

CadessDeVie believes the fashion forward sensibilities of New York City women have the power to promote social awareness and support charitable causes by doing what they have always done so well - Shop!

Life is good, shopping is fun and giving back feels great! Let’s Shop To Give together!
